div.p: View the latest copy of the SHS Elk Epress!
Click the More Info link to listen to the live Stratford Sports Network broadcast of Stratford Elk and Stratord Lady Elk sports.

Beginning December 6th, the Parent Portal will be updated to ASCENDER Parent Portal. If you have been using txconnect Parent Portal you will still log in with your current username and password. You should still be able to access your child's attendance and grades the same as you have done in the past. If you have any questions or problems please contact the administration office at 806-366-3300.

span.span: Stratford Independent School District believes that each student can learn and master basic skills in education, regardless of the student’s current academic achievement, socio-economic status, race, or gender.
Stratford Independent School District is firm in the conviction to provide effective and quality instruction.

img.alt: stay alert click here to report a school safety concern

div.p: To reach the Superintendent, please send an email to: mike.dominguez@stratfordisd.net
